# Terraform Enterprise Releases - 2023

Terraform Enterprise releases from 2023 are listed in the table below.

\* Denotes a <strong>required release</strong>. All online upgrades will automatically install this version, but airgap customers must upgrade to this version before proceeding to later releases.

\** The release package contains this version of the Terraform CLI, but you can install older and newer versions of the Terraform CLI as needed via the Admin [UI](/terraform/enterprise/admin/application/resources#managing-terraform-versions) or [API](/terraform/enterprise/api-docs/admin/terraform-versions).
